ComicInfo.Summary:
Number 53 in the B.P.R.D. series.With the help of the Lobster's last surviving ally, the B.P.R.D. has tracked Memnan Saa to the mountain refuge where he is holding Liz. But even the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense is unprepared for the apocalyptic battle ahead. Written by Mike Mignola and John Arcudi, and drawn by Guy Davis, B.P.R.D.: The Black Goddess is the second of three major arcs pulling together threads from throughout the series -- and leaving the B.P.R.D. and the world forever changed.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/bprd-the-black-goddess-2-the-black-goddess-part-2/4000-151886/
